name: Homunculust
description:
Homunculust is a fun single player game where you get to make your perfect person. Pick from a list of randomly assigned parts to put together your date. You could make a relatively normal guy or a torso with 5 legs. Its up to your creativity.

different combinations of limbs will give different endings. There are 8 total dates to go on. Get the first 6 to unlock two secret dates.

made for the Kiwijam2022 Game Jam

Made by:

David Lindsay - Awesome person #1

Adam Goodyear - Awesome person #2

ENJOY!!!
